attributes.action: Extend unemployment and other benefits to the struggling Self-Employed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The self-employed pay Income taxes, VAT and National Insurance, but when a recession or sickness strikes, there are few Benefits to help families to get through their difficulties. Any government that tried to help the UK's millions of self-employed in this way, would deserve to be elected with their support and that of organisations such as the FSB (Ferederation of Small Businesses).
